description: Gateway-managed environment keys for inference providers and CLI integrations.

variables.name: LLAMA_CPP_ENDPOINT
variables.description: Base URL for llama.cpp HTTP server.

variables.name: LLAMA_CPP_MODEL
variables.description: Display name for llama.cpp telemetry exports.

variables.name: OPENAI_API_KEY
variables.description: Gateway-issued token for OpenAI requests. Required only if 'openai' is selected in AI_PROVIDER or AI_PROVIDER_CHAIN.

variables.name: OPENAI_BASE_URL
variables.description: Override for OpenAI-compatible proxy or gateway.

variables.name: ANTHROPIC_API_KEY
variables.description: Gateway-issued token for Anthropic requests. Required only if 'anthropic' is selected in AI_PROVIDER or AI_PROVIDER_CHAIN.
